name: La Alfombra Magica
overview:
The once quiet city of Baghdad has been invaded by an evil tribe. The tribe kidnaps the princess and curses the citizens of Baghdad turning them to stone. Prince Aladdin learns of the abduction and flies on his magic carpet to rescue the princes with his magic genie and magic arrows.

You will encounter many dangerous members of the tribe during your journey who can only be killed with your magic arrows. You will encounter Monsters every step of the way as you approach the heart of the tribe, but you must go on. Will Prince Aladdin destroy the tribe? Will Prince Aladdin lift the evil curse and save the beautiful Princess and all the citizens of Baghdad?
